entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
